text: Ladi Kwali is a Nigerian potter that was born in 1925 in Kwali, Niger State.https://businessday.ng/news/article/10-things-to-know-about-ladi-kwali- first-woman-featured-on-naira/ She learnt to make pottery through her aunt. She died on 12 August 1984.https://businessday.ng/news/article/10-things-to- know-about-ladi-kwali-first-woman-featured-on-naira/ ==References== Category:1925 births Category:1984 deaths Category:Recipients of the Nigerian National Order of Merit Award Category:Niger State Category:Potters
title: Ladi Kwali
